General.Name: Guangzhou Huayan Precision Machinery Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Guangzhou Huayan Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. produces and sells PET preform systems worldwide. It manufactures injection molding machines, take-out robots, and valve-gated hot-runner PET preform molds. The company offers injection molding systems, PET preform molds, and mold parts. Its preform systems and molds are used in the fields of beverage, water, edible oil, food, detergent, and medical packages. Guangzhou Huayan Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Minyi  Li
1.Title: Director, Deputy GM, CFO & Sec. of the Board
